body.name: Wonchael WK070B Rectangular One Piece Elongated Modern Toilet Dual Flush Powerful Flushing Rectangular Bowl Unique Square Design Glossy Black 12"Rough-in
features: 🚽[Unique and eye-catching design]: The diamond-cut shape adds a distinct and visually appealing element to the toilet, making it stand out from traditional rounded or square designs.

🚽[Full Glazing on All Pipelines]: The entire pipeline of our toilet seat is fully glazed, providing a smooth and seamless flushing experience. This full glazing ensures that waste is efficiently and hygienically transported through the pipelines, minimizing the risk of clogs or blockages.
🚽[Comfortable seating]: A rectangular toilet seat provides a larger seating area compared to other shapes, offering more comfort and support during prolonged use.

🚽[Water-saving]: Dual-flush toilets have two flush options - a half flush for liquid waste and a full flush for solid waste. This allows users to choose the appropriate amount of water needed for each flush, resulting in significant water savings compared to traditional toilets.
🚽[Resistant to fading]: The black color of the toilet is resistant to fading over time, maintaining its original appearance for years.
🚽[Big trapway]:The larger trapway allows for a more powerful and efficient flush, which helps to prevent clogs. It can handle a larger volume of waste and toilet paper without getting blocked.
🚽[ Standard 12" rough-in]. Please measure your current toilet rough-in or the distance from the wall to the center of flange hole to make sure the 12" rough-in toilet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wonchael WK070B Elongated Square One Piece Black Toilet for Modern Bathroom Welcome to Wonchael! We are a company dedicated to creating high-quality bathroom products. Our brand story stems from our love and pursuit of bathroom spaces. The Wonchael team is constantly striving for excellence, committed to providing innovative, high-quality products, and services for our customers. Our design team explores tirelessly, meticulously crafting each product to revitalize your bathroom space. We pay attention to detail, emphasize quality, and ensure that each product perfectly embodies our yearning for a better life. Wonchael, hand in hand with you, to create a warm and comfortable home life. Join us on this exciting journey and let Wonchael bring a touch of luxury and sophistication to your bathroom!

High water seal Inhibits Odors: High water seal toilets reduce the emission of odors by creating a higher water seal between the tank and the drain hole, effectively isolating direct contact between the waste and the exhaust pipe. This makes using a high water seal toilet more comfortable and provides better hygiene.Provides a better seal: high water seal toilets have a greater impact of the water jet formed when draining due to the greater height of the water seal, effectively flushing waste down. This design also reduces gas escape and provides a better seal

More details Easy install toilet seat This type of cover comes with a quick release mechanism that makes installation and removal very easy and quick. It usually has a button that can be pressed to easily remove the cover from the toilet.Covers with pre-positioned pins: these covers are equipped with pre-positioned pins that are usually used in conjunction with holes in the toilet seat. Simply insert the pins into the holes and place the cover over the toilet and the pins will be fixed in place. Big trapway The larger trapway allows for a more powerful and efficient flush, which helps to prevent clogs. It can handle a larger volume of waste and toilet paper without getting blocked.With a toilet that has a larger trapway, there is a decreased likelihood of clogs and blockages. This means less need for plunging or calling a plumber to fix the issue, resulting in reduced maintenance and repair costs. Full Glazing on All Pipelines The entire pipeline of our toilet seat is fully glazed, providing a smooth and seamless flushing experience. This full glazing ensures that waste is efficiently and hygienically transported through the pipelines, minimizing the risk of clogs or blockages.
